Honoring those who gave their lives...
May 29, 2024 - 05:56
VFW Club members, along with school organizations and local volunteers, paid their respects to late veterans by placing American flags on their graves at Mt. Olivet Cemetery. This is an annual event that precedes the Memorial Day celebration each year. For more information to join the VFW Club or to become involved in next year’s event, contact the VFW at 580.326.6316. Pictured are Dan O’Grady, Kamryn Hinsley and Samantha Trapp.
